Container.Name: protonmail-bridge
Container.Overview:
ProtonMail Bridge for e-mail clients.
After the container has started you will need to access the CLI to do the initial setup. From unraid terminal and run the following: ```bash docker exec -it protonmail-bridge /bin/bash chmod +x entrypoint.sh /entrypoint.sh init ``` Wait for the bridge to startup, use `login` command and follow the instructions to add your account into the bridge. Then use `info` to see the configuration information (username and password). After that, use `exit` to exit the bridge.
You may need CTRL+C to exit the docker entirely. Then restart the container.
